summary: This bill, H.R. 1250, mandates the President to designate Ansarallah as a foreign terrorist organization within 30 days of the bill's enactment. Subsequently, the President must determine within another 30 days whether specific individuals (Abdul Malik al-Houthi, Abd al-Khaliq Badr al-Din al-Houthi, and Abdullah Yahya al-Hakim) are officials, agents, or affiliates of Ansarallah, submitting this determination to relevant Congressional committees. The bill defines Ansarallah to include the Houthi movement and any aliases.
